title: The Bears (Adrian Belew) - The Bears [1987/MP3/VBR V0]
description:
Track list:
01. None Of The Above
02. Fear Is Never Boring
03. Honey Bee
04. Man Behind The Curtain
05. Wavelength
06. Trust
07. Raining
08. Superboy
09. Meet Me In The Dark
10. Figure It Out

The Bears is an American band formed in 1985 in Cincinnati, Ohio, and continuing to create new music today. Its sound could be categorized as power pop, but draws from a diverse pallet of influences, and features the distinctive avant-garde guitar playing of Adrian Belew, the band&#039;s most prominent member.

In addition to guitarist, vocalist and producer Belew, the Bears consists of guitarist/vocalist Rob Fetters, drummer/vocalist Chris Arduser, and bassist Bob Nyswonger.
